actions.name: Shortbow
actions.description: DC 10 CON save or poisoned 1 minute; if save result 5 or lower, target is unconscious for same duration or until damaged or shaken awake.

actions.name: Heart Sight
actions.description: Touches a creature to learn emotional state; on failed DC 10 CHA save also learns alignment (celestials/fiends/undead automatically fail).

actions.name: Invisibility
actions.description: Turns invisible until it attacks or casts a spell or loses concentration; equipment is invisible too.
